Shape Up Game

This project is a MVC GUI application representing the board game Shape Up. The project is designed in 3 different main packages:


  • model: game API that are called by the controller, notifies his state change to the view
  • view: handle user input and call controller method
  • controller: transform view call (user) in game one (on the model)

The application can be consequently seen as a graph or a state machine. A user make an action, the view call the controller method, which translate it into correct model method call. The controller also changes the state of the model. The latter notifies the view, and so on.

The view is divided into a package for the console and another one for the hmi view. The model is divided into 4 different package, one for the board, another for the game, and two more for the player and his strategy. There is also a junit package used to test the core of the game.
The game is playable with 2 views (a console and hmi one) at the same time and therefore supports multithreading.

Packages
Package Description
fr.utt.lo02.projet.controller
Controllers for the MVC pattern (Main menu and Game) The controller are following the model state machine.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.junit  
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model
Model of the game Model are here seen as API with states, to match the MVC pattern a controller changes the state of a model which leads to an update of the views (Model are observable and View are observers).
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board
Board implementations with Card and coordinates This package contains every Board, and the Card, the Coordinates and the different enums of cards.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor
fr.utt.lo02.projet.board.visitor is containing the interface IBoardVisitor and its implementations.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game
Game variants and action results enums In this package we can find every Shape Up game implementation Including: ShapeUpGame, ShapeUpGameAdvanced and ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule Those are representing the game with different role as an model seen as a kind of API.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.player
Real and virtual players with their requests A Virtual player is a player following a strategy to do his choices.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.strategy
Implementation of the strategy pattern used for the virtual player actions Each virtual player has a strategy which determines his "difficulty level" The random strategy is considered easy, all of his actions are randomly calculated.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view
Views of the game using MVC pattern In the pattern, the model notifies a state change to the views (using the Observer pattern) Then the user acts on the view.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.console
Every console view code is gathered here for the MVC Views of the menu and game GameConsoleView and InitConsoleView are the 2 views for the Game and Menu set up.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi
Every Swing and AWT related code is gathered here for the MVC Views of the menu and game SwingHmiView and InitFrameView are here the main classes that extends JPanel and implements the views interface The other are utilities (CoordinatesConvertor, AddFont...) or part of panel (EndGameScoreDrawer, EndRoundScoreDrawer)
